caption_text: Process Flow Scheme The process scheme is shown in Fig. 3. Wood chips are introduced via a lock hopper into a softener. In this vessel the wood is digested for 10-15 min in water at 200 C and transformed into a paste.
raw_window: Process Flow Scheme The process scheme is shown in Fig. 3.
Wood chips are introduced via a lock hopper into a softener.
In this vessel the wood is digested for 10-15 min in water at 200 C and transformed into a paste.

caption_text: Experiments in autoclaves with s variety of biomass feeds revealed the reaction conditions for HTU (see also Table 1).

For high NYU conversion, selectivity and yield (as defined below) essential conditions are: temperature >300 C, liquid water present, and reaction time > 5 min.
Indications are that the less lignin the feedstock contains, the better conversion and selectivity will be.
